purpose: The email announces a tenure track position for an Associate Senior Lecturer in AI for Software Engineering at Blekinge Institute of Technology in Karlskrona, Sweden. It outlines the responsibilities of the position, which include research, teaching, and supervision in software engineering, with a focus on using and developing AI to improve software development processes. The email specifies the qualifications required for applicants, including a doctoral degree or equivalent scientific competence, and notes that preference will be given to those who completed their degree within the last five years. The application deadline is set for August 1, 2025, and further information is provided through a link.
